name: there.are.dice
description:
They roll together.

Feel free to post your lowest scores below.

Theme

The dice are joined together, they move together, their sums change the world around them. They move together, travel together and no dice are left behind.

The game has four different levels, introducing a handful of different puzzle mysteries. The challenge is solving them in the lowest amount of moves.

Process

Took it nice and slowly, since I am rather affected by my second Covid shot which I got the same friday as the Jam started.

Assets used:

  • Animated Dice -Random Art Attack
  • Gridbox Prototype Materials - Ciathyza
  • Ultimate Grids Engine - Gabodevelops
